entry.title: Qualifications for Land Surveyors
entry.summary: Land surveying is a very rewarding and exciting career path - with no two days exactly the same. entry.title: New ALTA/NSPS Land Title Survey Standards to Take Effect in February 2021
entry.summary: Effective February 23, 2021, the 2016 Minimum Standard Detail Requirements for ALTA/NSPS Land Title Surveys are being replaced with the new 2021 Minimum Standard Detail Requirements for ALTA/NSPS Land Title Surveys (“2021 Standards”). The 2021 Standards include a variety of changes which seek to further limit surveyor’s liability and provide better clarity. Some of the more notable changes are as follows: Various references to the word “shall” were replaced with “must” to reflect the United Stat...
